publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4547 Alex Johnstone: Governor Schwarzenegger’s Comments on the Climate Change (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament welcomes the comments of Republican Governor of California Arnold Schwarzenegger who has described the Climate Change (Scotland) Bill as "ambitious and comprehensive"; notes that Governor Schwarzenegger also stated that the bill "sends a message to the world that we must act now and we must act swiftly"; is encouraged that right-of-centre political parties are taking the lead on this issue and making true progress on climate change, and encourages other nations to follow Scotland’s lead in making the changes that will make a real difference to the environment.
